name: RabiesTestsForRabiesVirusNucleicAcid
title: Rabies (Tests for rabies virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of rabies nucleic acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC: Rabies virus probe/Rabies virus sequencing; 

LOINC search: 'rabies nucleic -isolate';  'rabies sequencing -isolate'),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
